 3.3 - INPUT ASSISTANCE
HELP(LEVEL AAA)
On accessible websites...

Context-sensitive help is available. 

These websites...

Help users avoid and correct mistakes.

WHAT'S AN EXAMPLE?
Some of the questions may be hard for new job seekers to understand. A help link
next to each question provides instructions and explanations for each question. 
Iâ€™d like to know a little more
[https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG22/Understanding/help.html#examples]

Web Content Accessibility Guidelines 2.2, W3C World Wide Web Consortium
Recommendation 05 October 2023 (https://www.w3.org/TR/2023/REC-WCAG22-20231005/,
Latest version at https://www.w3.org/TR/WCAG22/)
